description.@en: I begin my mornings in prayer, giving thanks and offering succor for the bounty provided.

system.notes:
Mage Trait

Professions of this Archetype make use of strange healing arts, plumb the depths of the supernatural and study Spells. They come from all walks of life and have sacrificed some part of their humanity to further their aims.

effect.@en: Whenever you awaken from six hours Sleep, make a Resolve Test to pray. If successful, you add +1 to three different Bonus Advances until you rest once again. These effects are not cumulative day over day.
